comment.author: 65906203@N00
comment._content:
From EllisIsland.org: Wilhelm Schleich, 26, from Esch, Germany, arrived on June 18, 1907. He was a passenger on the Zeeland from Antwerp, Belgium. 

There's also a William Schleich who arrived on April 22, 1905 on the Pennsylvania from Cuxhaven, Germany, but he's listed as being 19, so I would think the above listing is more likely correct.
